short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download the video according to the player settings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows downloading videos from the SBS On-demand service as MP4 files. The video quality and subtitles will be the same chosen from the player UI.
